description: the logical information needed to populate a button, excluding style information (which is down to the app rendering the button)

icon.description: the url of an image that will be rendered within the button - should be 64 x 64 pixels in size

behavior.description: when the button is clicked and a uri is present: either the user is redirected, or a popup renders the uri inside a modal (inside an iframe)

uri.description: the url that the button will redirect the user to when the button is pressed, or use to populate an iframe inside a modal

backgroundColor.description: the background color of the button, in hex format, without leading #, upper case letters (e.g. '22DD33')

textColor.description: the color of the button's text, in hex format, without leading #, upper case letters (e.g. '22DD33')

disabled.description: true if the button should appear disabled
